description:
The third season of BanG Dream!

The girls of Poppin'Party have come a long way, but the competition coming up is the biggest yet - the BanG Dream! Girls Band challenge at the legendary Budokan! Slots to compete are limited and the usual competitors will be vying for the chance, but the band to beat is the new RAISE A SUILEN, whose founder, Chiyu, has sworn to destroy both Roselia and Poppin'Party!

Indeed, Chiyu's main goal is to make Roselia's lead Yukina pay for denying Chiyu a spot as a producer, and the musical prodigy has the connections and resources to push the competition up to the next level! Can Poppin'Party keep up with the increased tempo and meet challenges like producing their own music video? They'll have to if they want to make it to the big show!

(Source: Sentai Filmworks)

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: Band
tags.description: Main cast is a group of musicians.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: Full CGI
tags.description: Almost entirely created with computer-generated imagery.

tags.name: Primarily Teen Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of teen characters.

tags.name: Twins
tags.description: Prominently features two or more siblings that were born at one birth.

tags.name: Rock Music
tags.description: Centers on the musical style of rock, not to be applied to anime that use rock in its soundtrack.

tags.name: Urban
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a city.

tags.name: Chuunibyou
tags.description: Prominently features a character with "Middle School 2nd Year Syndrome", who either acts like a know-it-all adult or falsely believes they have special powers.

tags.name: Gyaru
tags.description: Prominently features a female character who has a distinct American-emulated fashion style, such as tanned skin, bleached hair, and excessive makeup. Also known as gal.

tags.name: Tsundere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who acts cold and hostile in order to mask warmer emotions.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Cute Girls Doing Cute Things
tags.description: Centers around female characters doing cute activities, usually with little to no emphasis on drama and conflict.

tags.name: Idol
tags.description: Centers around the life and activities of an idol.

node.description:
Poppin'Party is an all-girl band in the BanG Dream! franchise. The group consists of five members:
- [Aimi](https://anilist.co/staff/109519/Aimi-Terakawa) (as [Kasumi Toyama](https://anilist.co/character/120229/)) on rhythm guitar and vocals
- [Sae Otsuka](https://anilist.co/staff/120235/) (as [Tae Hanazono](https://anilist.co/character/120232/)) on lead guitar
- [Rimi Nishimoto](https://anilist.co/staff/120234/Rimi-Nishimoto) (as [Rimi Ushigome](https://anilist.co/character/120231/)) on bass
- [Ayaka Ohashi](https://anilist.co/staff/110903/Ayaka-Ohashi) (as [Saaya Yamabuki](https://anilist.co/character/120233/)) on drums
- [Ayasa Itou](https://anilist.co/staff/118799/Ayasa-Itou) (as [Arisa Ichigaya](https://anilist.co/character/120230/)) on keyboard and tambourine

Poppin'Party first started out with Aimi, Rimi Nishimoto, and Ayasa Itou, before adding the other two members to become a full band. They debuted with the song "Yes! BanG_Dream!".
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/uetax)

Originating from [Production I.G](https://anilist.co/studio/10/Production-IG).
Tomomi Umetsu is a Japanese director, episode director and editor.

[Official Website](https://bushiroad.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kidanit)

Takaaki Kidani is a Japanese businessman. He is the founder and president of Bushiroad. Kidani has also served as the chairman of New Japan Pro-Wrestling (NJPW). He continues to be involved with NJPW through Bushiroad, in which owns the company.

He founded Bushiroad in May 2007 as a company that produces card games and assumed the position of president. The origin of the name Bushiroad comes from the failure to make Neppu Kairiku Bushi Road into a film due to various reasons when he led the project in the days of Broccoli. The film was restarted in March 2013 with Kidani as the executive producer. The company would create numerous media franchises including Tantei Opera Milky Holmes and BanG Dream!
**Iida Satoki** is a Japanese freelance sound director.

[Official Website ](http://www.ariamusic.co.jp/) | [Twitter ](https://twitter.com/agematsu)

Noriyasu Agematsu is the founding member of the musical group Elements Garden.

Along with his fellow Elements Garden members, he is the composer and arranger for the BanG Dream! franchise, including overseeing music production for its anime.

A lyricist affiliated with Elements Garden.

RAISE A SUILEN is an all-girl band in the BanG Dream! franchise. The group consists of five members:
- [Raychell](https://anilist.co/staff/137051/Raychell) (as [LAYER](https://anilist.co/character/136983/Rei-Wakana)) on lead vocals and bass
- [Riko Kohara](https://anilist.co/staff/120173/Riko-Kohara) (as [LOCK](https://anilist.co/character/133744/Rokka-Asahi)) on guitar
- [Natsume](https://anilist.co/staff/137052/Natsume) (as [MASKING](https://anilist.co/character/136984/Masuki-Satou)) on drums
- [Reo Kurachi](https://anilist.co/staff/137053/Reo-Kurachi) (as [PAREO](https://anilist.co/character/136985/Reona-Nyubara)) on keyboard
- [Risa Tsumugi](https://anilist.co/staff/137054/Risa-Tsumugi) (as [CHU²](https://anilist.co/character/136986/Chiyu-Tamade)) as DJ

They were tentatively given the name THE THIRD(仮) before getting their official name. The group was initially formed as a backup band for the vocalists of Afterglow, Pastel*Palettes, and Hello, Happy World! due to them being unable to play their characters' instruments. It was then revealed during the second live that THE THIRD has officially become part of the franchise, along with a new name, RAISE A SUILEN, and a newly recruited member, Risa Tsumugi.

[Official Website ](http://www.ariamusic.co.jp/) | [Twitter ](https://twitter.com/agematsu)

Noriyasu Agematsu is the founding member of the musical group Elements Garden.

Along with his fellow Elements Garden members, he is the composer and arranger for the BanG Dream! franchise, including overseeing music production for its anime.

Daisuke Kikuta is a Japanese music composer and arranger.

He is employed at Aria Entertainment and belongs to Elements Garden.
